58195.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「キ:

58196.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「と:

58197.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「よ:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>All right. Let's get started. First,

58198.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「う: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Yeah? - Yeah. What's that?<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58199.<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>「ク:
<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>Kukuku. Well, well, well...isn't that

58200.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ぬ:

58201.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「言:

58202.<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>That's right. You know what happens if

58203.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「バ: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>You idiot. The answer is no.<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58204.<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>「な: <start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>What? What did you just say, Kisama?<stop_lip_animation m14201 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58205.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ふ:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Ha-ha-ha! I said no! I, the genius, am
bound by no one! There was no way I
was going back to Demon World!<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58206.<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>「研:
<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>You've got the nerve of a researcher!
Then I'll do everything in my power to
bring you back!<stop_lip_animation m14201 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58207.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ふ:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Ha-ha-ha! I don't need to deal with

58208.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「行: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Go! item master<cs_pchero>!<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58209.<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>「せ:
<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>You're a fool to come back here after

58210.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ぬ:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Noooooo. I had no idea you were still

58211.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ふ:

58212.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「行: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Go! item master<cs_pchero>!<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

59108.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ま:

59109.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ふ:

59110.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ま:

59111.<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>「ア:

59112.<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>「ど:

59113.<start_lip_sync m14201 _normal m00001>「デ:

59114.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ぬ:

59115.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「あ:

59116.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ふ:

59117.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「さ:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Come on! Don't just stand there,

59118.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ふ:

59119.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「魔:
When I was in Demon World, I was in the Research and Development room under the command of a ground control

59120.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「そ:
My job in the Research and Development room was to strengthen the monstrosities of the ground troops,

59121.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「だ:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>However, there is no way that such a

59122.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ワ:

59123.<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ア:

59124.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「…:
